DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study efficacy , safety , tolerability LY2216684 adjunctive treatment patient major depressive disorder ( MDD ) , identify partial responder adequate course treatment selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor ( SSRI ) ( defined history ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Adjunctive Treatment Antidepressant Therapy Adults With Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.detailed_description: This 12 week multi-center , double-blind , placebo-controlled study efficacy LY2216684 augmentation selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor ( SSRIs ) patient MDD partial response treatment SSRI . While remain steady dose SSRI treatment entry study , patient randomly assign adjunctive treatment LY2216684 placebo 1:1 ratio 10 week acute treatment .
